name: Recycle Man (wisien92)
description:
Description:

You are playing as the famous Recycle Man - the last man standing between the armies of files and your precious system Hard Drive.

But oh no! What is happening? Angry viruses are attacking the hard drive and want to fill up all remaning disc space? Not on your duty! 

Use your hands to defend the disc space and perserve as much disk space as possible! Smash ground to perform AOE damage or attack enemies directly!

PS: Watch out not to destroy any of your stuff! During development we generated one hole in our desk.

Team Name:
Polskie Pierogi
